sentences.en: A multiple - position controller which has three discrete values of output.
sentences.cn: 一种含有三个离散输出值的多位置控制器.

sentences.en: A nebula is really a discrete mass of innumerous stars.
sentences.cn: 一团星云实际上是无数星体不连续的集合体.

sentences.en: Democritus argued that matter is formed from discrete particles.
sentences.cn: 德谟克利特认为物质是由分立的粒子构成的.

sentences.en: Discrete data is not necessarily homogeneous, and discrete selection is not necessarily contiguous.
sentences.cn: 离散数据不一定是同一类的, 离散选择也不一定是连续的.

sentences.en: He obtained discrete bands of colour materials.
sentences.cn: 他得到了各有色物质的判别谱带.

sentences.en: However, the hypertrophic obstructive type is sufficiently discrete.
sentences.cn: 但无论如何, 肥厚性梗阻型仍具有足够的独立性.

sentences.en: In many cases, only a complicated discrete component schematic is provided by the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 在许多情况下, 厂家提供的只是复杂的分立元件原理图.

sentences.en: Initially, clock - drivers were made from discrete components or special - driving integrated circuits.
sentences.cn: 最初, 时钟驱动器是由分立元件或专用的集成驱动电路构成的.

sentences.en: Most staple fibers are discrete, individual entities.
sentences.cn: 大多数短纤维是不联系的单独实体.

sentences.en: Mutual exclusion is the rule in both discrete and contiguous selection.
sentences.cn: 互斥对离散选择和连续选择都适用.

sentences.en: Probability distributions are classified as either discrete or continuous.
sentences.cn: 概率分布为离散型和连续型两种.

sentences.en: The change happens in a series of discrete steps.
sentences.cn: 这个变化在一系列分离的步骤中发生。

sentences.en: The organisms can be divided into discrete categories.
sentences.cn: 有机体可分为许多互不相联的种类。

sentences.en: The picture consists of a lot of discrete spots of colour.
sentences.cn: 这幅画由许多不相连的色点组成.

sentences.en: The proteins initially appear as discrete bodies.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质体最初作为分离体而出现.

sentences.en: They give off discrete amounts of radiant energy.
sentences.cn: 它们放出不连续的辐射能量.

words.tran_cn: 组件；不连续性（目标对于背景的显明度）
自由裁量权；谨慎；判断力；判定；考虑周到

phrases.tran_cn: 离散系统，集块参数系统

trans.tran_cn: 分离的，不相关联的，分立式，非连续
